item.description:
Each year, 2nd Story Theater puts on a play at the Courthouse at the historic Bristol Statehouse.  This year, they are performing "The Suitors".  Here is the description of the play:

"Our first full-fledged comedy at the Courthouse!  Jean Racine's riotous rhyming verse romp provides ample opportunity for disorder in the court, ambling iambically from the sacred to the profane.  Few escape the writer's comic wrath as translator Richard Wilbur aids in hazing both the legal profession and the lawsuit happy litigants who keep the judges well bribed, the lawyers well heeled, and the audience in stitches."

Ticket Information

Tickets are $15. (This is a preview night.) Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please call the 2nd Story Theater at 401-247-4200.

Please Note that Friday nights at do sell out early.  In addition, the Courthouse has less seats than the main theater. Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

Dinner Information

We will try Agave in Bristol for dinner.  Their address is:

Agave Restaurant

805 Hope Street
Bristol, RI 02809

For those that will be attending dinner, reservations will be made under "RI Theater Group" for 6:00 PM.

Cost of dinner will be handled as follows:

Drinks will be consigned to a separate check from the meal. Each person will add 30% to the price of their drink to cover the 8% RI Tax plus a 20% tip.

The meal will be on one check. A 20% tip will be added to the total and meal check will be divided evenly by the number of people attending the dinner.

I will send an e-mail including my cell phone number to all who RSVP "yes". If you will not make it to the restaurant by 6:00 PM please let me know.

Dinner is optional and is not included in the price of the ticket.

Meet-up Logistics

Please be at the theater NO LATER than 7:30.  Seating is general admission and since this is not part of the season ticket package, they will not be holding seats for us.  Seating is first-come;first-served, so please be prompt so we can all sit together. When you RSVP, I will provide my cell phone number in case you're running late or get lost.
item.how_to_find_us: In the lobby of the Bristol Statehouse
item.name: The Suitors
